name: Blackjack Shooter[FULLSCREEN]
description:
[PLAY IN FULLSCREEN]  

first unity game

 The goal of this game is to gain score in increments of 21. You do this by clicking cards with the desired value.  If you click a card that makes you go over the current target score, you will. Cards that are missed will be added to the bag count, when that goes over 21 the game will end. The bag count is decreased by 5 every time you hit the target score and by 2 every time you get a double(two of the same valued cards clicked consecutively.
